subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Unusual EVP
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
The messages I got copies of were gotten during a private investigation. 
From the words I've been able to decipher, they were apparently left by 
the deceased father of the person who got them.

Zack


On Fri, 31 Oct 2008, ghuny1 wrote:

> Yep sure have, some pretty long!! with many voices! There trying to
> get a hold of you!!!
> Happy Halloween!!!
> LK
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Zack Widup <w9sz@...> wrote:
>>
>> Has anyone here ever had a ghost/spirit/whatever leave a message on an
>> answering machine?
>>
>> This is one of the freakiest things I've ver heard!
>>
>> Zack
>>
